title: #477 Trading Louis for Luis with Louis C.K., Joe List, and Kerryn Feehan
itunes:title: Trading Louis for Luis with Louis C.K., Joe List, and Kerryn Feehan
description:
This is a spite-cast! We did this exact podcast about a month ago but the only difference this time, we swapped out Luis Gomez and swapped Louis C.K in. Louis, Joe List, Kerryn Feehan, and I talk about Joe and Louis' new movie, out now! Called 4th of July. I saw it and man, it's a good one. Head to LouisCK.com and find it in a theater in your town, it's gonna be all over but for a limited time only so go check it out.

 

Subscribe on YouTube 

Instagram - @arishaffir 

Patreon 

Cool merch & more

 

For more info about ‘Fourth Of July;: 

Fourth Of July – Louis CK 

Fourth of July Screenings 

 

For more Louis CK:

Louis CK 

 

For more Joe List: 

Instagram: @joelistcomedy 

Upcoming shows and more: Joe List 

 

For more Kerryn Feehan:

Instagram: @kerrynfeehan  

YouTube: Kerryn Feehan

 

The Music:

Iggy Pop- Louie Louie

Fuck you Luis

Deep Purple - Evil Louie

Groovy Movies - The Kinks

Bad Company - Bad Company

 

Thanks to our sponsors, YoKratom home of the $60 Kilo! and 3Chi.com! Use code "Ari" for 5% off your order!
